Hi, I'm Bryan.

Mechanical Product Design Engineer

Ex-Google, Ex-Apple, UC Berkeley Alumni

M.S. Mechanical Engineering, 2017
B.S. Mechanical Engineering, 2016
B.S. Electrical Engineering Computer Science, 2016

I have 7 years of experience shipping products in the consumer electronics industry. I've primarily worked on small form factor products that are dense with parts and systems.
